events.title: ArrayDialogueAttempt
events.description: I realized I could just set the text to what I wanted since typewriter wasn't working

parameters.value: "Finding the cave wasn’t the hard part, entering it was. The entrance of the cave had a large gaping maw."
"Vheran could see the rubble from where the rocks fell to show the cave opening. He remembers a cave just like this when he was younger, when he was reckless and foolish."

"Fen: Grr. 
Fen growled at the entrance, like she could feel the same dark energy he did."
"He placed a hand on her side to ground her. Or was it to ground himself? He didn’t want to go in there, but he knew he was the only one who could."
"Nydlean, having sensed the dark magic emanating from the cave, had run back with the other children after quickly convincing the others to return home."
"Vheran had told the clan head that he would check out the cave and deal with the dark magic but now standing in front of it all he felt was trepidation. "

parameters.text: "Finding the cave wasn’t the hard part, entering it was. The entrance of the cave had a large gaping maw."
"Vheran could see the rubble from where the rocks fell to show the cave opening. He remembers a cave just like this when he was younger, when he was reckless and foolish."

"Fen: Grr. 
Fen growled at the entrance, like she could feel the same dark energy he did."
"He placed a hand on her side to ground her. Or was it to ground himself? He didn’t want to go in there, but he knew he was the only one who could."
"Nydlean, having sensed the dark magic emanating from the cave, had run back with the other children after quickly convincing the others to return home."
"Vheran had told the clan head that he would check out the cave and deal with the dark magic but now standing in front of it all he felt was trepidation. "

"Flashback: He feels the phantom emotion of his younger self, eager to enter a cave just like this, naïve to the danger within. He feels the phantom touch of a hand on his shoulder, hears a laugh and a jovial call of “Let’s Go!”"

"Fen: *whine* 
Fen whimpers up at him, she scuffs the ground with her paw. He pats her head. "
"Vheran: “I’m fine. We got to clear this place out so we should get started.”"
"He begins his descent into the cave. He sends a prayer to the Gods for protection, and a thanks that Nydlean didn’t fight him when he told him to stay behind."
"A cave like this is no place for a child. And he couldn’t leave this to someone else, it was his job to clear and cleanse places like this."
"Entering the cave and the dark presence in the cave grew stronger. He could feel the malevolence surrounding him and if he was a normal man he be chocked with fear."
"He could tell with the cave wall turning into stone that the cave was another underground ruin. And the bad feelings he had when he was younger came flooding back."
"Young Vheran: “I got a bad feeling about this place, maybe we should go back to the camp? Come back with the clan head and a group?”"
"Young Tamaris: “I mean I feel it too, but we might find some cool stuff here, and then we can bring it back. Maybe she won’t be so upset with me.”"
"Young Vheran: “How was she only upset with you, I had equal fault for leading the bear to camp.”"
"Young Tamaris: “Because I got caught and I wouldn’t rat you out. You know me better than that.”"
"Young Vheran: “You really need to stop taking the whole blame for yourself.”"
"Young Tamaris: “Eh, I know you’d do the same for me, now come on. If we find something to bring back the clan head might forgive me.”"
"Young Vheran: “Alright”"

"Fen: *bark* 
Fen’s bark drew his attention from his memories. She was growling and primed for an attack. "

"He saw the large spiderwebs covering the walls as they walked deeper in. He needed to focus; one distraction and it would be over. He heard a chittering noise and jumped back from the large form jumping from the shadows."

"Vheran Thoughts: “Giant spiders, they must have grown bigger from the dark magic.”
He whistled for Fen, so she’d know they were going to head into combat. "

"Fen: *bark* 
She barked in confirmation and readied herself for his commands."
"Welcome"
"Making quick work of the spiders he continued, finding an ornate door, the lock was unpickable so a key would have to be found."

"Vheran: “There doesn’t seem to be another way around this, so we are going to have to find the key.”
He said to Fen. She tilted her head in response."
"He found a room with a chest. Picking the lock of the chest revealed an ornate key that matched the door from the main room."

"Taking the key, he felt a surge of dark magic, he cried out in pain and drew his hand back. The magic ran through his body, and he fell to his knees in pain. His eyes sharpened and glowed bright as he forced the malevolent energy out of his body."
"He breathed out slowly and Fen whimpered in concern."

"Vheran: “I’m fine, just wasn’t expecting it to be so strong.” 
He answered her and stood up with the key."
"Vheran: “If the energy was that strong then that means whatever is sealed here is very powerful.”"
"Vheran: “We should keep going. Come on, Fen.”"
"Fen: *Bark*"
"After unlocking the door with a key. He entered a long hallway, and he could feel the dark magic coming from further down the hall. He saw decomposed corpses shuffling around."

"Vheran: “It’s been a while since I’ve fought the undead.” 
He spoke. Pulling his dagger from his sheath he prepared to fight."
"Killing the last skeleton, he sheathed his blades on his belt and stared at the bodies in front of him. This place reminded him of too much. He closed his eyes and felt the memories pull him again."
"Young Tamaris: “Corpses! The hell is going on here.”"
"Young Vheran: “I don’t know their armor is not something I’ve seen before.”"
"Young Tamaris: “No, it looks ancient, you think these were warriors from when we had kingdoms.”"
"Young Vheran: “Could be, but why were they reanimated?”"

"Young Tamaris: “Maybe some left over magic that was still here as a defense.” 
*shudder* “I don’t like the idea of my body being preserved like this for magic to take over.”"
"Young Vheran: “If they were left to protect something, then what was it?”"
"Young Tamaris: “I don’t know but we have to find out.”"

"He shook his head to release the memory. He hated this, why here and why now. For years he avoided these memories and now this damn elven ruin leads him to remember things he wishes he could forget."
"He clicked his teeth for Fen to follow him. He needed to find the source of the dark energy and get rid of it."
"Entering the final room, he found an altar surrounded by a barrier of dark magic."
"Vheran: “The dark presence in the ruin must have created the barrier to keep me out.”"
"Feeling that the barrier couldn’t be dispelled without breaking the crystals surrounding them, he went to work breaking them."
"After the barrier was dispelled, he remembered when a similar artifact was found like this but without the barrier in place."
"Young Tamaris: “Oh wow look at this, the clan can’t be upset with me anymore if we bring this back home.”"
"Young Vheran: “What is it?”"
"Young Tamaris: “It looks like an effigy of one of our gods.”"
"Young Vheran: “Are you sure we should take this; it was protected maybe we should leave it?”"
"Young Tamaris: “Yeah but we got through the defenses so that means we earned it.”"
"Young Vheran: “I guess.”"
"Young Tamaris: “It will be fine, I’m sure of it.” Tamaris takes the effigy."
"Vheran: “You tempted me before but this time, I won’t fall for your tricks.”"
"He went to attack the effigy, but a cry surrounded the cave. A dark spirit formed from the effigy and attacked him."
"Vheran whistled for Fen to get ready."
"Killing the spirit, destroyed the effigy and the dark energy surrounding the cave disappeared. He made his way back to camp."
"Seeing the path to camp, he felt one more memory come to his mind. A memory of blood, tears, and screams."
"Young Vheran: “Tamaris, why?! The clan?”"
